biotools.summary: Tool to perform meta-analysis of summary statistics obtained from a series of related studies. The special feature of it is the ability to meta-analyze the results of multiple linear and logistic regression models, broadly used in genome-wide association studies (GWAS).

bioschemas.name: METAINTER
bioschemas.summary: Tool to perform meta-analysis of summary statistics obtained from a series of related studies. The special feature of it is the ability to meta-analyze the results of multiple linear and logistic regression models, broadly used in genome-wide association studies (GWAS).
